nature_language: [当前位置杭州,目标位置广州,旅行人数5,旅行天数5] 公司4女和1男去广州团建，计划去5天，想要去网红景点和餐厅打卡，并且吃好吃的
nature_language_en: [Current location: Hangzhou, Destination: Guangzhou, Number of travelers: 5, Duration of travel: 5 days] A company group consisting of 4 women and 1 man is going to Guangzhou for a team-building trip. They plan to stay for 5 days and want to visit popular attractions and restaurants, as well as enjoy delicious food.
